title: Brain in a Jar
summaries: The Brain in a Jar is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Spider Brain pet, a miniature version of the Brain of Cthulhu, to follow the player around. The Brain in a Jar has a 1/4 (25%) of being dropped by the Brain of Cthulhu in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a spider brain
'Pickled and shrunken, this brain can no longer hurt you.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
